TopicTitle: No "Flight In Progress" after rover landing

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, so I landed my first rover on the Mun.

Then I tried to go back to space center and reload, but the rover doesn't appear at "Flight in Progress"!

when I left it, it had full batteries, and was able to drive it and all was great
Did you accidentally click "End Flight", instead of "Space Center"?
If you have a quicksave you can rename the quicksave.sfs to persistent.sfs and your rover will be back, otherwise it is gone, as End Flight ends the flight of the active craft.
